pkgmetadata.longdescription: C++ Implementation of Component-Wise Boosting // C++ implementation of component-wise boosting implementation of component-wise boosting written in C++ to obtain high runtime performance and full memory control. The main idea is to provide a modular class system which can be extended without editing the source code. Therefore, it is possible to use R functions as well as C++ functions for custom base-learners, losses, logging mechanisms or stopping criteria.
